unnormalised: *   **Cardio:** Think running, swimming, cycling. Building endurance is key, whether it’s running 5 km daily or doing interval sprints.
normalised: *   **Cardio:** Think running, swimming, cycling. Building endurance is key, whether it is running five kilometer daily or doing interval sprints.

unnormalised: *   **Strength Training:** Hitting the gym! Focus on compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, bench press. Even just bodyweight exercises like push-ups and planks can make a huge difference.
normalised: *   **Strength Training:** Hitting the gym! Focus on compound exercises like squats, deadlifts, bench press. Even just bodyweight exercises like push-ups and planks can make a huge difference.

unnormalised: *   **Skill-Specific Drills:** This is where you hone your craft. Practicing your tennis serve, your cricket shot, or your football pass.
normalised: *   **Skill-Specific Drills:** This is where you hone your craft. Practicing your tennis serve, your cricket shot, or your football pass.

unnormalised: *   **Rest & Recovery:** Don't underestimate this! Your body needs time to rebuild. Aim for 7-8 hours of sleep and incorporate active recovery like yoga or stretching. Maybe even a relaxing head massage (champi!) from mom! Remember to take rest days – push too hard and you'll risk injury. And hydration is key, especially in the Indian heat! So chug that nimbu paani after a tough session at 09:00 hrs. A well-designed training regimen will get you closer to that gold medal, or at least help you win bragging rights at the next gully cricket match!
